subtitle: Succulent chicken combines cooked with apricots and  spiced rice.

method.text: Heat the oil in a flameproof casserole dish. Add the chicken. Fry for 3-4 min, turning once, until well browned. Transfer to a plate.
Add the onion to the casserole dish. Fry for 3 min. Stir in the carrots, rice and spices. Cook, stirring constantly for 2 min.
Pour in the stock. Stir in the sultanas. Season. Bring to the bowl. Cover. Cook in the oven for 45 min.
Meanwhile, halve, stone and slice the peaches. Stir into the casserole. Return to the oven for 5 min. Serve.

title: Peachy chicken and rice
